text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Ngubani OyiNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba?” Yithi: “NguAllâh.” Yithi: “Ingaba nina nizithabathela bakhuseli bambi na ngaphandle kwaKhe, abangenamandla okuzinceda okanye awokuzenza ububi eziqwini zabo?” Yithi: “Ingaba ongaboniyo uyafana na nobonayo?” Okanye bayamanisa kuAllâh amahlulelane adale indalo efana nqwa neyaKhe, kangangokuba loo ndalo (yabo) ibonakale ifana kubo?” Yithi: “UAllâh nguMdali wezinto zonke; yaye Yena Ungongaphikisekiyo.”
